SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Passwordmanager] ( [Passwordmanager_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [Passwordmanager_Titolo] varchar(200) NULL , [Passwordmanager_Username] varchar(200) NULL , [Passwordmanager_Password] varchar(200) NULL , [Passwordmanager_PasswordCrypt] varbinary(MAX) NULL , [PasswordmanagerCategorie_Ky] int NULL , [Anagrafiche_Ky] int NULL , [Utenti_Ky] int NULL , [Passwordmanager_UserInsert] int NULL , [Passwordmanager_UserUpdate] int NULL , [Passwordmanager_UserDelete] int NULL , [Passwordmanager_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [Passwordmanager_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [Passwordmanager_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [Passwordmanager_Descrizione] varchar(MAX) NULL , [SitiWeb_Ky] int NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Passwordmanager] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_Passwordmanager PRIMARY KEY ([Passwordmanager_Ky])
